--- alter_table_add_check.sql
alter table foo add check (c1 > 0)

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name: "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AddTableConstraint{
    Add: 16,
    TableConstraint: &ast.TableConstraint{
      Constraint: &ast.Check{
        Check: 20,
        Rparen: 33,
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op: ">",
          Left: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 27,
            NameEnd: 29,
            Name: "c1",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 32,
            ValueEnd: 33,
            Base: 10,
            Value: "0",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD CHECK (c1 > 0)
